events.message: I received my order last week, but the item is the wrong size and I want to request a refund.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to wrong item size delivered.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong-sized item.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and I have attached a photo showing that the item is indeed smaller than what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the refund to reflect.
Thanks for the quick response and for resolving this. I appreciate how fast you are handling the refund.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. You should receive a confirmation email shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received and everything is in order. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been completed and no further action is pending on your side.
